item.title: Language processing 100 knocks-88: 10 words with high similarity
item.description: [Language Processing 100 Knock 2015](http://www.cl.ecei.tohoku.ac.jp/nlp100/) 88th record "10 words with high similarity" is recorded. Extract similar words from all words. This is also the process I want to do from my mailbox and minutes. Technically it is almost the same as the previous content. Reference link Links Remarks 088. 10 words with high similarity.ipynb Answer program GitHub link Amateur language processing 100 knocks: 88 I have always taken care of 100 language processing knocks #Environment
